name: lazyharry
title: LazyHarry
description: It allows me to add a note from anywhere to my local notes file.
author: harry_daniel_gurth

commands.name: new-idea
commands.title: New Idea
commands.subtitle: Append an idea to a local file
commands.description: Appends a new idea note to my local braindump.md file

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
